meaning: chase, drive away, follow, pursue, meanwhile

onyomiExamples.meaning: investigation (e.g. into someone's guilt), questioning, pressing, hounding, pinning down, catching up, overtaking

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to chase, to run after, to pursue, to follow after, to follow (a set order, a trend, etc.), to drive out, to get rid of, to oust, to expel, to drive (e.g. a herd), to be pressed (e.g. for time)
